function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of vital medical equipment such as ventilators and N95 masks","Impact":"Increased risk of unmet healthcare needs and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increased production capacity, diversified sourcing, and stockpile management","Technologies":"Blockchain, RFID, and IoT for traceability and transparency","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and the general public","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and manufacturers"},{"Description":"Restrictions on exportation of PPEs","Impact":"Dependent countries at risk of shortages","Mitigation":"Global cooperation and scenario planning, reduced import tariffs, and joint procurement frameworks","Technologies":"Blockchain, RFID, and IoT for increased transparency","People":"Dependent countries, healthcare workers, and patients","Owner":"EU, individual countries' governments, and regional organizations"},{"Description":"Dependence on imports and donations for critical healthcare equipment","Impact":"Vulnerability to global supply chain disruptions","Mitigation":"Local production, trade agreements, and stockpile management","Technologies":"Blockchain, RFID, and IoT for traceability and transparency","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and the general public","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and manufacturers"}]}
